comments:
Current user have to select on a existing project in the Perfmon launcher. 
Instead, user should be asked to assign an existing or newly created Project 
and Monitor as in other profiling launcher, this will give the consistence of 
all profile launcher, as well as giving user the flexibility to group agents.

Note: the sub-tabs under the Profile tab are not 'real' launch configuration 
tabs. They are created entirely by us, and the platform does not recognize them 
as tabs (only as widgets under the profile tab). In order to have a top-level 
tab, the destination 'tab' will have to be wrapped by a real one in order to 
show up, and get the error message handling.

User can now specify any existing or new project or monitor as in the other 
profiling monitors.

The UI widgets have not been added to another tab as there is plenty of estate 
for them on the main perfmon tab.

The changes have been made and added to CVS.
